TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Point

Docs.summary: Represents a single point in a series in a chart.

remarks.para: The object is a member of the collection. The collection contains all the points in one series.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Application { System::Object ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: When used without an object qualifier, this property returns an object that represents the Microsoft Word application. When used with an object qualifier, this property returns an Application object that represents the creator of the specified object (you can use this property with an OLE Automation object to return the application of that object). Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public object ApplyDataLabels (Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XlDataLabelsType Type = Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XlDataLabelsType.xlDataLabelsShowValue, object LegendKey, object AutoText, object HasLeaderLines, object ShowSeriesName, object ShowCategoryName, object ShowValue, object ShowPercentage, object ShowBubbleSize, object Separator);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ApplyDataLabels([in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XlDataLabelsType Type, [in]object LegendKey, [in]object AutoText, [in]object HasLeaderLines, [in]object ShowSeriesName, [in]object ShowCategoryName, [in]object ShowValue, [in]object ShowPercentage, [in]object ShowBubbleSize, [in]object Separator) runtime managed

Public Function ApplyDataLabels (Optional Type As XlDataLabelsType = Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XlDataLabelsType.xlDataLabelsShowValue, Optional LegendKey As Object, Optional AutoText As Object, Optional HasLeaderLines As Object, Optional ShowSeriesName As Object, Optional ShowCategoryName As Object, Optional ShowValue As Object, Optional ShowPercentage As Object, Optional ShowBubbleSize As Object, Optional Separator As Object) As Object

Docs.param: The type of data label to apply.
True to show the legend key next to the point. The default value is False.
True if the object automatically generates appropriate text based on content.
For the and objects, True if the series has leader lines.
Pass a boolean value to enable or disable the series name for the data label.
Pass a boolean value to enable or disable the category name for the data label.
Pass a boolean value to enable or disable the value for the data label.
Pass a boolean value to enable or disable the percentage for the data label.
Pass a boolean value to enable or disable the bubble size for the data label.
The separator for the data label.
Docs.summary: Applies data labels to a point.

remarks.para: can be one of the constants.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ApplyPictToEnd { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: True if a picture is applied to the end of the point or all points in the series. Read/write Boolean.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ApplyPictToFront { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: True if a picture is applied to the front of the point or all points in the series. Read/write Boolean.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ApplyPictToSides { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: True if a picture is applied to the sides of the point or all points in the series. Read/write Boolean.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Border As ChartBorder

Docs.summary: Returns a object that represents the border of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ClearFormats() runtime managed

Docs.summary: Clears the formatting of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Copy() runtime managed

Docs.summary: If the point has a picture fill, then this method copies the picture to the Clipboard.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created. Read-only Integer.

remarks.para: If the object was created in Microsoft Word, the property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD." This property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code. For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD. For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DataLabel As DataLabel

Docs.summary: Returns a object that represents the data label associated with the point. Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Delete() runtime managed

Docs.summary: Deletes the object.

remarks.para: Deleting a object deletes the entire series.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Explosion { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the explosion value for a pie-chart or doughnut-chart slice. Returns 0 (zero) if there's no explosion (the tip of the slice is in the center of the pie). Read/write Integer.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Fill As ChartFillFormat

Docs.summary: Returns a object for a specified shape or a object for a specified chart that contains fill formatting properties for the shape or chart.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Format As ChartFormat

Docs.summary: Returns the line, fill, and effect formatting for the object. Read-only .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Has3DEffect { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: True if a point has a three-dimensional appearance. Read/write Boolean.

remarks.para: This property applies only to bubble charts.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HasDataLabel { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: True if the point has a data label. Read/write Boolean.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Height As Double
public: property double Height { double get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the height, in points, of the object.
Docs.value: The height, in points, of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Interior As Interior

Docs.summary: Returns an object that represents the interior of the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool InvertIfNegative { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: True if Microsoft Word inverts the pattern in the object when it corresponds to a negative number. Read/write Boolean.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Left As Double
public: property double Left { double get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that represents the distance, in points, from the left edge of the object to the left edge of the chart area.
Docs.value: The distance, in points, from the left edge of the object to the left edge of the chart area.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MarkerBackgroundColor { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Sets the marker background color as an RGB value or returns the corresponding color index value. Applies only to line, scatter, and radar charts. Read/write Integer.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlColorIndex MarkerBackgroundColorIndex { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlColorIndex get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlColorIndex value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the marker background color as an index into the current color palette, or as one of the following constants: or . Applies only to line, scatter, and radar charts. Read/write .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MarkerForegroundColor { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Sets the marker foreground color as an RGB value or returns the corresponding color index value. Applies only to line, scatter, and radar charts. Read/write Integer.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlColorIndex MarkerForegroundColorIndex { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlColorIndex get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlColorIndex value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the marker foreground color as an index into the current color palette, or as one of the following constants: or . Applies only to line, scatter, and radar charts. Read/write .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MarkerSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the data-marker size, in points. Can be a value from 2 through 72. Read/write Integer.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlMarkerStyle MarkerStyle { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlMarkerStyle get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlMarkerStyle value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the marker style for a point or series in a line chart, scatter chart, or radar chart. Read/write .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the object name.

remarks.para: Read-only. This property corresponds to the name of a data point on a chart. The name is represented using the following format:

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parent As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Parent { System::Object ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the parent for the specified object. Read-only Object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Paste() runtime managed

Docs.summary: Pastes a picture from the Clipboard as the marker on the selected point.

remarks.para: This method can be used on column, bar, line, or radar charts, and it sets the property to .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlChartPictureType PictureType { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlChartPictureType get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlChartPictureType value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets a value that represents the way pictures are displayed on a column or bar picture chart.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double PictureUnit { double get(); void set(double value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the unit for each picture on the chart if the property is set to (if not, this property is ignored).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double PictureUnit2 { double get(); void set(double value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the unit for each picture on the chart if the property is set to (if not, this property is ignored). Read/write Double.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float64 PieSliceLocation([in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XlPieSliceLocation loc, [in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XlPieSliceIndex Index) runtime managed
Public Function PieSliceLocation (loc As XlPieSliceLocation, Optional Index As XlPieSliceIndex = Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XlPieSliceIndex.xlOuterCenterPoint) As Double

Docs.param: Specifies a horizontal or vertical coordinate.
Specifies which pie slice position coordinate to return. The default value is .
Docs.summary: Gets the vertical or horizontal position of a point on a chart item, in points, from the top or left edge of the object to the top or left edge of the chart area.
Docs.returns: The vertical or horizontal position of a point on a chart item, in points.

remarks.para: This property applies only to pie chart types.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SecondaryPlot { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: True if the point is in the secondary section of either a pie of pie chart or a bar of pie chart. Applies only to points on pie of pie charts or bar of pie charts. Read/write Boolean.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Select() runtime managed

Docs.summary: Selects the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Shadow { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets a Boolean value that determines if the object has a shadow.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Top As Double
public: property double Top { double get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that represents the distance, in points, from the top edge of the object to the top edge of the chart area.
Docs.value: The distance, in points, from the top edge of the object to the top edge of the chart area.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Width As Double
public: property double Width { double get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the width, in points, of the object.
Docs.value: The width, in points, of the object.
